programme.title: Shorts in Love
programme.desc: Presenting love stories about tortured souls. In ``Martin's Hagge,`` a man plagued by a physical manifestation of his anxiety is nudged from his melancholy by a co-worker, and in ``Replay,`` a man's date with a girl takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Shorts in Love
programme.desc: In ``Before I Come Back,`` a film director and father must reassess his personal priorities; in ``Tidal,`` a young man must choose to stay in his old life or commit to his pregnant girlfriend.

programme.title: World Cinema
programme.desc: Stories about wild kids include ``We Are the Bulls`` from South Korea, in which a group of boys breaks all the rules to escape everyday life; ``19'35`` from France sees a youth center in upheaval; ``Carga`` from Portugal.

programme.title: Pure Drama
programme.desc: A presentation of dramas dealing with life and death. Included are ``If You Can Hear Me`` where a boy discovers a death by suicide, ``Mayday,`` where friends go flying, and in ``Abstract Furies,`` where a couple is tested following the death of their son.

programme.title: Pure Drama
programme.desc: In ``Grounded,`` a woman attempts to stop a deportation; a woman joins the first female cadets accepted into military service academies in ``The Haircut``; ``To Pimp a Butterfly`` involves a teen trying to save his mother.

programme.title: Pure Drama
programme.desc: Powerful drama about desperate mothers and their children; in ``Mariposa,`` a mom does her best to raise her daughter with dignity and provide a roof over their heads; ``Caroline``; ``Del Rio``; ``And the Wind Falls.``.

programme.title: Pure Drama
programme.desc: Films about kids under bad influences include Oscar winner ``Skin`` involving racial tensions and a gang war; a mom casts a shadow on her son's future in ``The Son, the Father``; things turn bad at ``The Garage.``.

programme.title: Pure Drama
programme.desc: In ``Grounded,`` a woman attempts to stop a deportation; a woman joins the first female cadets accepted into military service academies in ``The Haircut``; ``To Pimp a Butterfly`` involves a teen trying to save his mother.

programme.title: Midnight Horror
programme.desc: In ``Senses,`` a violent supernatural force emerges as an abused woman reaches the breaking point; a man encounters something evil in his apartment in ``The Pallor.``.

programme.title: Sex in Shorts
programme.desc: ``Love Collection`` portrays a single, seductive actor who lets himself go to idleness and easy sex.

programme.title: Pure Drama
programme.desc: Dramas about siblings fighting for survival include ``Hardland,`` in which two brothers are forced to survive after the collapse of society; ``The Plague`` sees two siblings take refuge in a secluded cabin to avoid a deadly plague.

programme.title: Pure Drama
programme.desc: Presenting a drama about being trapped. In ``Icebox,`` a boy enters America's rigid immigration process, in ``Geeta,`` a woman comes to the US to work as a housemaid at an Indian diplomat's house, and ``One Day`` sees a young mother battling OCD.

programme.title: Pure Drama
programme.desc: Films about kids under bad influences include Oscar winner ``Skin`` involving racial tensions and a gang war; a mom casts a shadow on her son's future in ``The Son, the Father``; things turn bad at ``The Garage.``.

programme.title: Comedy
programme.desc: Comedies about work include ``Cabu Cabu 011`` about the adventures of a cab driver in Italy; ``The Death of Tempo``; in ``Ghostsitter,`` a young woman interviews for what she thinks is a babysitting job; ``The Waiting Room.``.

programme.title: Animation
programme.desc: Animations about escape attempts include ``Man in the Box,`` about an old prisoner who tries to revive his glory days as a magician to escape; also ``Elsewhere,`` ``The Escape,`` refugee drama ``Edna,`` and ``Night of the Leaving Dreads.``.

programme.title: Short Docs
programme.desc: Presenting docs about immigrants and their homelands; included are ``My Dream Goes All the Way to Iran``, and ``The Fires of Kurdistan``, where a man recalls wars during Saddam Hussein's dictatorship and his escape to Sweden as a refugee.

programme.title: Editor's Pick
programme.desc: Shorts about extraordinary experiences include ``Pisces of an Unconscious Mind,`` where an office worker faces unexpected events; an archaeologist makes a strange find in ``Bones``; the futuristic ``Aymara``; ``Somatic.``.

programme.title: Shorts in Love

programme.title: Shorts in Love
programme.desc: Love stories with a historic angle include ``The Bridge,`` in which injured World War II soldiers and nurses bond while waiting for nightfall to escape enemy territory; in ``Rabbits,`` a lonesome man in 1914 in Kansas has his memory jogged by a find.

programme.title: World Cinema
programme.desc: The Colombian short ``La Casa`` sees a man return to his childhood home as his mother is dying; in ``At Your Pace,`` a French drummer plans to leave South Korea; in ``Fatima's Son`` from Spain, a mother looks for her son.

programme.desc: After his daughter (Abigail Breslin) is infected with a virus that transforms her into a zombie, a small-town farmer (Arnold Schwarzenegger) will stop at nothing to save her.

programme.title: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: The spirit of a woman who was lynched more than 150 years earlier haunts residents (Emma Caulfield, Lee Cormie) of a New England town.

programme.title: Black Nativity
programme.desc: A street-wise teen discovers the value of faith, healing and family after he goes to New York to spend Christmas with his estranged relatives (Forest Whitaker, Angela Bassett).

programme.title: The Amityville Horror

programme.title: Runner Runner
programme.desc: A Princeton grad student (Justin Timberlake) becomes the protege of an online-gambling tycoon (Ben Affleck) whose shady dealings have attracted the attention of the FBI.

programme.desc: With help from her partner (Andy Garcia), a police inspector (Ashley Judd) searches for a killer who is murdering her former lovers.

programme.title: The Order

programme.title: Larry Crowne

programme.title: Cinderella Man

programme.title: Waist Deep
programme.desc: An ex-convict (Tyrese Gibson) collides with members of a street gang after his car is stolen with his son inside.

programme.title: Runner Runner
programme.desc: A Princeton grad student (Justin Timberlake) becomes the protege of an online-gambling tycoon (Ben Affleck) whose shady dealings have attracted the attention of the FBI.

programme.title: The Prophecy 3: The Ascent
programme.desc: Transformed into a mortal, the angel Gabriel (Christopher Walken) protects a half-angel/half-man who can save the human race.

programme.title: Master of the White Crane Fist: Wong Yan-lam
programme.desc: A kung fu master battles an opium dealing gang.

programme.title: Amityville 3-D
programme.desc: A reporter's (Tony Roberts) wife (Tess Harper) and a psychic (Robert Joy) try to warn him, but he insists on buying a haunted house.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Troubled people attempt to mend their lives as they brace themselves for a comet that threatens Earth.

programme.title: Assassins
programme.desc: A veteran hit-man (Sylvester Stallone) contends with a crazy upstart (Antonio Banderas) and bad memories while embarking on his final assignment.

programme.title: Blue Ruin
programme.desc: An ominous piece of news sends a drifter (Macon Blair) back to his hometown to exact brutal -- and inept -- revenge for the deaths of his parents.

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: Johnny English springs back into action when a hacker reveals the identities of undercover agents in Britain. As a man with few skills and analogue methods, Johnny must overcome the challenges of modern technology to make this mission a success.

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: King Leonidas (Sean Maguire) and his strapping warriors rise up to defend Sparta from invading Persians, bad punch-lines and celebrity look-alikes.

programme.title: Kajillionaire
programme.desc: Two con artists have spent 26 years training their only daughter to swindle, scam and steal at every turn. During a desperate and hastily conceived heist, they charm a stranger into joining them, only to have their entire world turned upside down.

programme.title: Gun Shy
programme.desc: A therapist (Sandra Bullock) helps a legendary agent (Liam Neeson) who has lost his nerve but must fulfill one final obligation before retiring.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Itinerant con men (Matt Damon, Heath Ledger) become caught in a real fairy tale after several maidens disappear in an enchanted forest.

programme.title: War Horse
programme.desc: After being forcibly parted from its beloved owner, a remarkable horse changes and inspires the lives of all it meets as it moves through the battlefields of World War I.

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: Two years ago, retired CIA agent Bryan Mills (Liam Neeson) used his "particular set of skills" to rescue his daughter, Kim (Maggie Grace), from kidnappers. Since then, Kim has been learning self-defense from her father, and Bryan has been on a personal mission to reunite with his ex-wife (Famke Janssen). In Istanbul, Bryan and his family cross paths with Murad (Rade Serbedzija), whose son died at Bryan's hand during Kim's rescue. Murad wants revenge, and he'll stop at nothing to get it.

programme.title: A Rodeo Film
programme.desc: A bull rider has an affair with his brother's wife.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: For the past year, DEA agent Bobby Trench (Denzel Washington) and U.S. Navy intelligence officer Marcus Stigman (Mark Wahlberg) have been working under cover as members of a narcotics syndicate. The twist: Neither man knows that the other is an undercover agent. When their attempt to infiltrate a Mexican drug cartel and recover millions goes haywire, the men are disavowed by their superiors. Trench and Stigman must go on the run lest they wind up in jail or in a grave.

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: A Democratic political consultant helps a retired Marine colonel run for mayor in a small Wisconsin town.

programme.title: Against the Ropes
programme.desc: Boxing manager Jackie Kallen (Meg Ryan) believes she and a veteran trainer can turn a young man (Omar Epps) into a streamlined prizefighter.

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: While in the woods near their small town, upstanding local Hank Mitchell (Bill Paxton), his dim brother Jacob (Billy Bob Thornton) and their friend Lou (Brent Briscoe) discover a crashed plane with two things in it -- a dead pilot, and a stash of more than four million dollars. Although Hank is reluctant to keep the money, Jacob and Lou convince him otherwise, and they devise a plan to split the fortune. Things quickly go wrong, however, dramatically affecting the trio and those around them.

programme.title: Employee of the Month
programme.desc: Zack (Dane Cook) and Vince (Dax Shepard) are rival co-workers at Super Club, the country's largest bulk-discount retailer but, while Vince is on the fast-track at Super Club, Zack's laid-back approach to work holds him back. That all changes when a new cashier, named Amy (Jessica Simpson), transfers to their store. Zack is instantly smitten, but Amy prefers Vince. Zack determines that the only way to win her is to win his store's most coveted honor.

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: Florida resident Diana (Melissa McCarthy) has a luxurious lifestyle as the queen of retail, buying whatever strikes her fancy -- and it's all free, thanks to Sandy Patterson (Jason Bateman), a guy from Denver whose identity she stole. With just one week to track down Diana before his world implodes, the real Sandy heads south to confront the unapologetic con artist and bring her back to Denver so that he can clear his name and restore his shattered credit rating.

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: For Detective Harry Hole, the death of a young woman during the first snowfall of winter feels like anything but a routine homicide. His investigation leads him to "The Snowman Killer," an elusive sociopath who continuously taunts Hole with cat-and-mouse games. As the vicious murders continue, Harry teams up with a brilliant recruit to try and lure the madman out of the shadows before he can strike again.

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: A prosecutor (Dominic Cooper) commits a fatal hit-and-run, then manipulates the case so that the man who was arrested for the crime is acquitted. After the trial, he discovers that his actions have freed a guilty man.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise and Cameron Crowe reunite after "Jerry Maguire" for "Vanilla Sky," the story of a young New York City publishing magnate who finds himself on an unexpected roller-coaster ride of romance, comedy, suspicion, love, sex and dreams in a mind-bending search for his soul.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: Con artist Lawrence Jamieson (Michael Caine) is a longtime resident of a luxurious coastal resort, where he enjoys the fruits of his deceptions -- that is, until a competitor, Freddy Benson (Steve Martin), shows up. When the new guy's lowbrow tactics impinge on his own work, Jamieson resolves to get rid of him. Confident of his own duplicitous talents, Jamieson challenges Benson to a winner-takes-all competition: whoever swindles their latest mark first can stay, while the other must leave town.

programme.title: The Witches of Eastwick
programme.desc: Three small-town friends, Alexandra (Cher), Jane (Susan Sarandon) and Sukie (Michelle Pfeiffer), each having lost the man in their lives, are feeling unfulfilled -- until a furtive stranger, Daryl Van Horne (Jack Nicholson), arrives and begins courting each of them in turn. Eventually, Daryl tells them that they are witches. But as the three friends spend more time at his mansion, enjoying themselves and learning about their powers, they begin to worry about Daryl's ultimate intentions.

programme.title: Igby Goes Down
programme.desc: Igby Slocumb (Kieran Culkin), a rebellious and sarcastic 17-year-old boy, is at war with the stifling world of old money privilege he was born into. With a schizophrenic father (Bill Pullman), a self-absorbed, distant mother (Susan Sarandon), and a shark-like young Republican big brother (Ryan Phillippe), Igby figures there must be a better life out there -- and sets about finding it.

programme.title: Murder in the First
programme.desc: Henry, a small-time criminal sent to Alcatraz, is caught attempting to escape and as punishment, he's put in solitary confinement. Instead of staying the maximum nineteen days, he is kept alone, in the cold and complete darkness for years, only to emerge a madman and a murderer. It's a rookie lawyer who proves Alcatraz is to blame, and that Henry should not be executed.

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: Intelligent satire of American television news. A highly strung news producer finds herself strangely attracted to a vapid anchorman even through she loathes everything he personifies. To make matters worse, her best friend, a talented but not particularly telegenic news reporter, is secretly in love with her.

programme.title: Repentance
programme.desc: A disturbed client (Forest Whitaker) uses torture to coerce a self-help author (Anthony Mackie) into confessing his untold crimes.

programme.title: Babylon A.D.
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a battle-hardened mercenary, Toorop (Vin Diesel), lives by his own code and the credo kill or be killed. His latest assignment is to escort a young woman named Aurora (Mélanie Thierry) and her guardian, Sister Rebeka (Michelle Yeoh), from Kazakhstan to New York. Facing danger at each turn, Toorop begins to realize that Aurora represents the last hope for mankind's survival.

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: Six months after the original epidemic, the rage virus has all but annihilated the population of the British Isles. Nevertheless the U.S. Army declares the danger past, and American soldiers arrive to restore order and begin reconstruction. Refugees return to British soil, but one of them carries a deadly secret: The virus is not gone and is even more dangerous than before.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: A detective and a criminal profiler pursue a serial killer whose crimes are inspired by a children's game called hangman.

programme.title: Fatale
programme.desc: After a wild one-night stand, a successful sports agent watches his perfect life slowly disappear when he discovers the sexy and mysterious woman he risked everything for is a determined police detective who entangles him in her latest investigation. As he desperately tries to put the pieces together, he falls deeper into her trap, risking his family, his career, and even his life.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: For Dan Gallagher (Michael Douglas), life is good. He is on the rise at his New York law firm, is happily married to his wife, Beth (Anne Archer), and has a loving daughter. But, after a casual fling with a sultry book editor named Alex (Glenn Close), everything changes. Jilted by Dan, Alex becomes unstable, her behavior escalating from aggressive pursuit to obsessive stalking. Dan realizes that his main problem is not hiding his affair, but rather saving himself and his family.

programme.title: Dragged Across Concrete
programme.desc: Police partners descend into the criminal underworld after they are suspended for assaulting a suspect on video.

programme.title: Strange but True
programme.desc: A woman tells her deceased boyfriend's family that she is pregnant.

programme.title: Nothing but Trouble
programme.desc: While attempting to seduce gorgeous lawyer Diane Lightson (Demi Moore), wealthy gadabout Chris Thorne (Chevy Chase) agrees to drive her to Atlantic City, N.J. But, when some reckless driving draws the attention of a deeply critical cop (John Candy), they and the flamboyant "Brazillionaires" (Taylor Negron, Bertila Damas) who tagged along end up in the court of a grotesque and vengeful judge (Dan Aykroyd), who has a special vendetta against the wealthy and erudite.

programme.title: Changeling
programme.desc: In 1928 Los Angeles, single mother Christine Collins (Angelina Jolie) arrives home to find her son, Walter, gone. Five months later her prayers are answered when Walter is found in Illinois. But to Christine's horror, the boy who steps off the train is not her son. Authorities vehemently dispute Christine's claim, and her one ally is a clergyman (John Malkovich) who sees the case as his chance to expose corruption in the Los Angeles Police Department and government.

programme.title: Reservation Road
programme.desc: The fates of two men and their families converge following a tragic accident. Ethan Lerner (Joaquin Phoenix) and his family are on the way home from their son's cello recital. The same evening, law associate Dwight Arno (Mark Ruffalo) and his son are returning from a ballgame. In a flash, the unthinkable happens, and Ethan's son dies beneath the wheels of Dwight's car. Dwight speeds away, and Ethan, as the only witness to the tragedy, begins his quest for justice.

programme.title: Leatherface: Texas Chainsaw Massacre III
programme.desc: Driving through Texas, young yuppie couple Michelle (Kate Hodge) and Ryan (William Butler) stop at the Last Chance Gas Station, but after they witness the owner attacking a hitchhiker named Tex (Viggo Mortensen), they panic and flee. In their hasty departure, they get lost and soon find themselves pursued by the chainsaw-toting maniac known as Leatherface (R.A. Mihailoff). While running, the couple bump into survivalist Benny (Ken Foree), who they team up with in an effort to escape.

programme.title: 10 Years
programme.desc: Former high-school friends (Channing Tatum, Rosario Dawson, Justin Long) meet again after a decade and discover that the passage of time has changed some things, but not others.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: FBI criminal profiler Will Graham (William L. Petersen) is called out of early retirement to assist on a serial murder case involving a killer known as the "Tooth Fairy" (Tom Noonan). Graham enlists the help of imprisoned serial killer -- and cannibal -- Dr. Hannibal Lecktor (Brian Cox), who is the reason Graham took an early retirement. Soon, Graham and the FBI are entangled in a deadly cat-and-mouse game between the Tooth Fairy, Lecktor and an interfering journalist (Stephen Lang).

actor.role: FBI Agent Will Graham (as William Petersen)

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Aimless David Rice (Hayden Christensen) has the ability to instantly transport himself to any place he can imagine. He uses that gift to globe-trot, living on money he steals by "jumping" into bank vaults. He's captured by the evil Roland Cox (Samuel L. Jackson), who knows how to keep David from jumping. David escapes and reunites with his high school crush, Millie (Rachel Bilson), then forms an alliance with fellow jumper Griffin (Jamie Bell) and prepares for mortal combat with Cox.

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: In this film loosely based on a true story, Domino Harvey (Keira Knightley), a former model, is now a bounty hunter who has been arrested for robbing an armored car. During interrogation, she claims innocence and tells her story. Harvey became a pupil of Ed Moseby (Mickey Rourke), who ran a course for aspiring bounty hunters. Along with Choco (Edgar Ramírez), the three of them became a successful team. But, when a bail bondsman (Delroy Lindo) offered a job, they faced a complicated frame-up.

programme.title: This Is 40
programme.desc: After many years of marriage, Pete (Paul Rudd) is the sole male in a household that includes his wife, Debbie (Leslie Mann), and two young daughters (Iris Apatow, Maude Apatow). As Pete struggles to keep his record label afloat, he and Debbie navigate a three-week course of sex and romance, career victories and financial hardships, aging parents and maturing children. They'll have to learn to forgive, forget and enjoy the rest of their lives -- before they kill each other.

programme.title: The Rocker
programme.desc: As a drummer with the '80s hair band Vesuvius, Robert "Fish" Fishman lived his dream as a rock 'n' roll demigod until his band mates kicked him out. Twenty years later, Fish gets a second shot at sitting on the throne of music stardom when his teenage nephew's group hires him as the new drummer.

programme.title: Backtrack
programme.desc: A troubled psychologist (Adrien Brody) returns to his hometown to uncover the truth behind his strange visions.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Husband-and-wife team Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt help clients design and build the perfect house -- from the ground up -- in just three months.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Welcome Inn
programme.desc: Dave and Jenny make a critical decision that gets their dream project back on track; While pushing the renovation forward, they enlist the help of their community in order to find ways to create a memorable experience for their future guests.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: A couple's bungalow near their son's university is too small for their family of five and too old to expand; Brian and Mika demolish the old house and use the clean slate to build a charming, modern dream home before the school year starts.

programme.title: Building Off the Grid
programme.desc: A couple sets out to build a tree-house retreat in northern Georgia overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains; although the build calls for a mile-long, uphill trek with all of their materials, the end result is the ultimate childhood dream come true.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Welcome Inn
programme.desc: Dave and Jenny make a critical decision that gets their dream project back on track; While pushing the renovation forward, they enlist the help of their community in order to find ways to create a memorable experience for their future guests.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: A couple's bungalow near their son's university is too small for their family of five and too old to expand; Brian and Mika demolish the old house and use the clean slate to build a charming, modern dream home before the school year starts.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Drew and Jonathan update the awkward floor plan of a single-story house with some 1970s quirks for two high school sweethearts who have moved 14 times in 15 years, and are ready to make their forever home dreams a reality.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: A family has decades' worth of memories in their home, but the '80s finishes and uneven floor levels have them desperately ready for a change; Drew and Jonathan transform the kitchen and living spaces to breathe new life into their forever home.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: A couple buy their builder-grade home while expecting their first child; now that they're a family of four, the uneven floors and cramped deck are an issue; Drew and Jonathan manage conflicting design ideas to give this home a much-needed overhaul.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Jonathan and Drew Scott are on a mission to turn families' ordinary houses into their lifelong dream homes; couples who are settled in their home but need the brothers' expertise to make it perfect will qualify for a complete makeover.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Brian and Sarah create an outdoor sports pub for a housewarming party.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Brian and Sarah build a vacation-style getaway, including a volleyball court and kid clubhouse, in Sham and Ruban's backyard.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Brian and Sarah build a new deck, fire pit area, and a three-season living space for Becki and Shawn's country home.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Brian and Sarah bring Tammy and Sam's backyard back to life with a new dining and lounge area, and a functional pool house.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Brian and Sarah transform Andrea and David's basic yard, complete with a veggie garden, dining room, BBQ zone, and a kids' play space.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Brian and Sarah add an entertaining space for Nicole and Charles.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Brian and Sarah transform an underused backyard into a sports court, a lounge space, and a mom's retreat.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Brian and Sarah build a lounging space and a multipurpose space for Jenn and Josh.

programme.title: Backyard Builds
programme.desc: Brian and Sarah transform Marlow and Phil's yard into a space for cooking, entertaining, and playing.

programme.desc: When a pregnant woman disappears after attending a prenatal yoga class, a marriage is put under a microscope (New!).

programme.title: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: The beating death of a 15-year-old girl in Draper, Utah, outrages her parents, who had adopted her five years prior; one witness implicates a local drug dealer and another a mysterious gang member, but it seems almost everyone is lying (New!).

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A homeowner has high hopes for the renters who move in next door; then, his hopes are dashed, setting the stage for a shocking act of violence that threatens to claim many lives.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: In Garden Grove, Calif., 19-year-old Jose Najera sneaks out of his parents' house to attend a late-night party, then he returns home to find both parents dead on their bedroom floor.

programme.title: The Killer Beside Me
programme.desc: A Virginia Beach massage therapist disappears before work, sparking an intense search; weeks later, a cyclist discovers trash bags in a swamp.

programme.title: The Killer Beside Me
programme.desc: An illegal insurance scam leads to the destruction of an entire family.

programme.title: The Killer Beside Me
programme.desc: A retail store employee's crush on manager Antoinette Venditti Bruce escalates into an obsession after he's fired for inappropriate behavior; she is transferred out of state for work and the stalker tracks her down to carry out his twisted plans.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: In Alabama, teenager Haley craves her independence, but her protective mother, Teresa, worries about the company she's keeping; Teresa convinces Haley to end a toxic relationship with a young man, but he won't let go until he gets what he wants.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: Sophia Putney-Wilcox is excited to start her senior year of high school after ending an abusive relationship with her boyfriend, Adam; unable to take the rejection, Adam breaks into her house with a bottle of gasoline and a lighter.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: In November 2009, Yei and John Daniels come home to find their house ransacked; a few days later, after enjoying the Christmas of a lifetime, a knock at the door changes their lives forever.

programme.title: Nightmare Next Door
programme.sub-title: Dear Katherine, It's Me the Killer
programme.desc: When 18-year-old college freshman Katherine Foster goes missing, rumors fly as fellow students at the University of South Alabama fear the worst.

programme.title: Nightmare Next Door
programme.desc: In Rock Hill, S.C., former homecoming queen Melinda Snyder's murder embroils the town in a mystery that won't be settled until the South Carolina Supreme Court weighs in.

programme.title: Nightmare Next Door
programme.desc: Jimmy McClain is a teacher and coach at a Tennessee high school, then he is found assassinated in his home, and police must contend with a laundry list of suspects.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A family loves everything about their new home except the mockingbirds that perch and squawk in the backyard lemon tree; the family seeks to scare them off, igniting a feud with their neighbors that spins out of control until someone lies dead.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: Living in her family home, a woman befriends her new neighbors, only to be plunged into a nightmare of threats, violence and betrayal; after her brother steps up to protect her, blood will be spilled and lives forever shattered.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A single woman and her daughter are delighted when a single man and his two daughters move in next door; they become fast friends until molestation charges result in anger, accusations and multiple bloody deaths.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Dancer Jodi Sanderholm spends weeks practicing for her team's big performance, then vanishes hours before the event, which doesn't make sense until a friend comes forward with strange details about the days leading up to Jodi's disappearance.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: After college graduate Anita Wooldridge goes missing from her parents' home, investigators must rely on quick thinking and cunning police work, as they race against the clock to find her before it's too late.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Single mom Carrie Caudill and a friend embark on a girl's night out, but an unexpected confrontation puts Carrie on a dangerous collision course with a sadistic madman.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Despite her family's protests, 19-year-old Micah Rine marries Thomas Pate and moves away with him; when Thomas reports Micah missing after she fails to return home from a run, investigators take a close look at their life together in Tennessee.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Ronald and Patty had always seen the signs that their older brother, Bernard Eugene Giles, had a darker side, but when Gene finally let loose the monster lurking inside, they couldn't help but wonder how things had gone so wrong.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Teenager Sarah Garone is targeted by an anonymous predator for nearly a decade; each time, Sarah turns to her stepfather, Gary Hardy, for protection, not realizing he is the one determined to hurt her.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: A woman believes that her sister blames her for the crimes she committed.

programme.title: I (Almost) Got Away With It: Confessions
programme.desc: After making millions smuggling pot across the U.S. border, a multinational drug operation goes down in one of the biggest busts in history; a jailbird makes one last attempt at freedom in a series of botched robberies and high-speed chases (New!).

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Shelly Lietz has been afraid of her son ever since he was four years old, and her fear intensifies and grows more crippling as he gets older and more violent, turning her into a prisoner in her own home.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Alice Swanson envies her childhood neighbor William Jennings Choyce for his perfect life, then she marries him and realizes his life wasn't perfect below the surface.

programme.title: I (Almost) Got Away With It: Confessions
programme.desc: After making millions smuggling pot across the U.S. border, a multinational drug operation goes down in one of the biggest busts in history; a jailbird makes one last attempt at freedom in a series of botched robberies and high-speed chases (New!).

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: George and Margaret Keller don't suspect that the man terrorizing their city could be a member of their own family; as it dawns on them that their son hides a sinister secret, they must decide whether or not to turn him in.

programme.title: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: Menachem Stark enjoys life as a respected businessman and father to seven children; in 2014, his wife calls police when he fails to return home, and a subsequent search leads to a dark secret.

programme.title: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: After being stabbed at his Marietta, Ga., home, beloved son Mitchell Jones dies at the hospital; Mitchell is a popular gay man, so police have several potential suspects; it isn't until they employ a new tracking tool that the case breaks wide open.

programme.title: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: Divorced soccer mom Paige Birgfeld's disappearance catapults her ex-husbands to the top of the suspect list, but when one of them provides a tantalizing clue about Paige's risky secret life, the number of potential culprits explodes.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: When a teenager is found savagely stabbed to death in her home, police hope a trail of blood found at the crime scene will lead them to her killer.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: When the lifeless body of a young girl is found on the shore of the Feather River, police hope that following a trail of footsteps and discarded articles of clothing will lead them to her killer.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: The abduction of a young mother from a crowded hospital parking lot is the beginning of a terrifying mystery that torments her loved ones for decades.

programme.title: Crime Scene Confidential
programme.desc: CSI Alina Burroughs opens the vault on one of her most notorious cases: the death of toddler Caylee Anthony; reexamining the grim clues, including a controversial strip of duct tape, Alina tries to let the evidence speak for a child without a voice.

programme.title: Crime Scene Confidential
programme.desc: Alina Burroughs is eager to determine whether Michelle Witherell accidentally fell from her balcony, committed suicide, or was murdered; searching for the truth, she navigates a maze of conflicting pathology reports.

programme.title: Crime Scene Confidential
programme.desc: When family man Brian Hughes falls dead in his living room, it looks like a robbery gone wrong; the evidence soon suggests a plot hatched from inside his home, and CSI Alina Burroughs deciphers the ballistics to give a silenced victim the final word.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: After two young men are found shot in an apartment hallway, Lt. Joe Kenda must rely on his inner lie detector to figure out which victim is being deceptive; police investigate a murder in broad daylight and nearly get killed themselves.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: The discovery of a family home littered with corpses leaves Lt. Kenda with the task of unwinding the paranoid obsessions of a diseased mind and forces him to face his greatest fear; a fatal beating at a motel illuminates the dark underbelly of love.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl goes missing, sending Kenda's city into a panic; just when investigators think they've got a handle on what is going on, a cryptic letter to the district attorney's office suggests that the girl isn't the only victim.

programme.title: Love, Honor, Betray
programme.desc: Donna Andersen almost has it all, but something's missing until James Montgomery enters her life; the future looks bright until Donna makes a discovery that turns her marriage into a living nightmare.

programme.title: Love, Honor, Betray
programme.desc: When Sarah Ripoli was just 6 years old, a terrible event tore her family apart; the discovery of secret writings from beyond the grave helps Sarah understand what went on between her mom and dad.

programme.title: Love, Honor, Betray
programme.desc: Deborah Jones and Gerard Pepin seem like the perfect match until a dark accusation tears their marriage apart; as the scale of Gerard's wrongdoing comes to light, Deborah decides to fight to bring him to justice, whatever the personal cost.

programme.title: Love, Honor, Betray
programme.desc: Butch Halley finds love with the charming Sunny, and he can't wait to start their new life together, but sinister rumors soon threaten to tear the family apart.

programme.title: 20/20 on ID
programme.desc: The so-called "Rehab Mogul," Christopher Bathum, owns more than 20 alcohol and drug treatment facilities in two states; however, some clients claim Bathum is a drug user and sexual predator who derailed their recovery.

programme.title: 20/20 on ID
programme.sub-title: Stranger Than Fiction: The Murder of Angie Dodge
programme.desc: After Angie Dodge's murder, investigators quickly convict a suspect; her mother Carol eventually grows convinced he is not the real killer, and works tirelessly at her quest to find the real truth behind her daughter's death.

programme.title: 20/20 on ID
programme.sub-title: Stranger Than Fiction: The Murder of Angie Dodge
programme.desc: After Angie Dodge's murder, investigators quickly convict a suspect; her mother Carol eventually grows convinced he is not the real killer, and works tirelessly at her quest to find the real truth behind her daughter's death.

programme.title: Caught in the Net
programme.desc: When 26-year-old Erica Crippen Crosby disappears from her home in Mount Laurel, N.J., detectives must follow a digital trail to uncover the horrifying truth about what happened to her.

programme.title: 20/20 on ID
programme.sub-title: Stranger Than Fiction: The Murder of Angie Dodge
programme.desc: After Angie Dodge's murder, investigators quickly convict a suspect; her mother Carol eventually grows convinced he is not the real killer, and works tirelessly at her quest to find the real truth behind her daughter's death.

programme.title: 20/20 on ID
programme.sub-title: Stranger Than Fiction: The Murder of Angie Dodge
programme.desc: After Angie Dodge's murder, investigators quickly convict a suspect; her mother Carol eventually grows convinced he is not the real killer, and works tirelessly at her quest to find the real truth behind her daughter's death.

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: In the 1970s, down-and-out jazz trumpeter Miles Davis (Don Cheadle) tries to recover his new session tape from music producers.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A married crime novelist finds himself in a tough predicament when an eccentric mystic summons the spirit of his first wife during a séance.

programme.title: The Vow
programme.desc: Paige (Rachel McAdams) and Leo (Channing Tatum) are happily married newlyweds, but their idyllic life together suddenly shatters when a car accident leaves her in a coma. When Paige awakes, she has severe memory loss and doesn't know Leo. She also has a confusing relationship with her parents (Sam Neill, Jessica Lange) and still harbors feelings for a former fiance (Scott Speedman). Despite these difficult obstacles, Leo is determined to renew their bond and rebuild their marriage.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: Ferris Bueller (Matthew Broderick) has an uncanny skill at cutting classes and getting away with it. Intending to make one last duck-out before graduation, Ferris calls in sick, "borrows" a Ferrari, and embarks on a one-day journey through the streets of Chicago. On Ferris' trail is high school principal Rooney (Jeffrey Jones), determined to catch him in the act.

programme.title: The Circus: Inside the Greatest Political Show on Earth
programme.desc: As President Biden travels to Brussels for an emergency NATO summit, "The Circus" examines Russia's threats of using nuclear weapons in its ongoing invasion of Ukraine and what the West is doing to prevent that catastrophic escalation.

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc: In 2002, cable news producer Kim Barker (Tina Fey) decides to shake up her routine by taking a daring new assignment in Kabul, Afghanistan. Dislodged from her comfortable American lifestyle, Barker finds herself in the middle of an out-of-control war zone. Luckily, she meets Tanya Vanderpoel (Margot Robbie), a fellow journalist who takes the shellshocked reporter under her wing. Amid the militants, warlords and nighttime partying, Barker discovers the key to becoming a successful correspondent.

programme.title: Mainstream
programme.desc: A young woman finds a path to internet stardom when she starts making videos with a charismatic stranger.

programme.title: Embattled
programme.desc: The eldest son of a ruthlessly tough MMA champion must fight his way out of the abusive cycle his father has continued.

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: Chuck goes on a retreat to regroup; Prince looks to consolidate his wins; Wendy tries to figure out Prince's bigger picture; Sacker reckons with some old skeletons in her closet.

programme.title: Super Pumped: The Battle for Uber
programme.desc: Travis finds himself on trial at Apple HQ, fighting for Uber's very existence; Arianna and Bill disagree on how best to steer Travis in the right direction; Emil has an illuminating conversation.

programme.title: First Reformed
programme.desc: The pastor of a small church in upstate New York spirals out of control after a soul-shaking encounter with an unstable environmental activist and his pregnant wife.

programme.title: Racing With the Moon
programme.desc: In their last weeks before deployment to World War II as Marines, teenage friends Henry Nash (Sean Penn) and Nicky (Nicolas Cage) try to make the best of the time they have left in their small California town. When Nash spots Caddie Winger (Elizabeth McGovern), a new girl in town he mistakenly believes to be wealthy, he sets about winning her over. But the good times are ruined when Nicky finds himself trying to solve a serious predicament, and implicating Nash and Caddie in the process.

programme.title: 7 Days in Entebbe
programme.desc: In July 1976, four terrorists hijack an Air France flight from Tel-Aviv to Paris and force the flight crew to land in Entebbe, Uganda. There, the Jewish passengers are held hostage, with their safety contingent on the release of dozens of terrorists jailed in Israel, Germany and Sweden. After considerable debate, the Israeli government employs the Israeli Defense Forces to execute a daring rescue.

programme.title: Dreamland
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Old Henry
programme.desc: A quiet man and his son take in a wounded stranger near his homestead, along with a bag full of cash. The stranger claims he's a sheriff being pursued by outlaws, but the man can't be sure.

programme.title: The Mauritanian
programme.desc: A defense attorney, her associate and a military prosecutor uncover a far-reaching conspiracy while investigating the case of a suspected 9/11 terrorist imprisoned at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, for six years.

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Adopted as a child, new father Mel Colpin (Ben Stiller) decides he cannot name his son until he knows his birth parents, and determines to make a cross-country quest to find them. Accompanied by his wife, Nancy (Patricia Arquette), and an inept yet gorgeous adoption agent, Tina (Tea Leoni), he departs on an epic road trip that quickly devolves into a farce of mistaken identities, wrong turns, and overzealous and love-struck ATF agents (Josh Brolin, Richard Jenkins).

programme.title: A Ghost Story
programme.desc: A passionate young couple, unexpectedly separated by a shocking loss, discover an eternal connection and a love that is infinite.

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Sam Wheat (Patrick Swayze) is a banker, Molly Jensen (Demi Moore) is an artist, and the two are madly in love. However, when Sam is murdered by friend and corrupt business partner Carl Bruner (Tony Goldwyn) over a shady business deal, he is left to roam the earth as a powerless spirit. When he learns of Carl's betrayal, Sam must seek the help of psychic Oda Mae Brown (Whoopi Goldberg) to set things right and protect Molly from Carl and his goons.

programme.title: Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights
programme.desc: American high-school student Katey (Romola Garai) moves with her wealthy parents (Sela Ward, John Slattery) to Cuba in 1958. She encounters Javier (Diego Luna), a poor local who works as a waiter, and soon a relationship blossoms between them. At a nightclub, Javier teaches Katey the nuances of Cuban dance, which becomes her passion. As the young lovers grow closer, Fidel Castro suddenly rises to power. When her parents decide to flee to the United States, Katey must make a difficult choice.

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: The Light of the Moon
programme.desc: Bonnie is a young New York architect whose life changes forever when a stranger rapes her in an alley. She receives loving and unwavering support from her boyfriend while trying to cope with the devastating effects of the attack.

programme.title: Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom
programme.desc: The remarkable life of South African revolutionary, president and world icon Nelson Mandela (Idris Elba) takes center stage. Though he had humble beginnings as a herd boy in a rural village, Mandela became involved in the anti-apartheid movement and co-founded the African National Congress Youth League. His activities eventually led to his imprisonment on Robben Island from 1964 to 1990. In 1994, Mandela became the first president of democratic South Africa.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: A federal agent investigates the decades-old death of a teenage girl in his drought-stricken hometown.

programme.title: The Last Black Man in San Francisco
programme.desc: Jimmie and his best friend Mont try to reclaim the house built by Jimmie's grandfather, launching them on a poignant odyssey that connects them to their past, even as it tests their friendship and sense of belonging in the place they call home.

programme.title: Selma
programme.desc: Although the Civil Rights Act of 1964 legally desegregated the South, discrimination was still rampant in certain areas, making it very difficult for Blacks to register to vote. In 1965, an Alabama city became the battleground in the fight for suffrage. Despite violent opposition, Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. (David Oyelowo) and his followers pressed forward on an epic march from Selma to Montgomery, and their efforts culminated with President Lyndon Johnson signing the Voting Rights Act of 1965.

programme.title: Whiplash
programme.desc: Andrew Neiman (Miles Teller) is an ambitious young jazz drummer, in pursuit of rising to the top of his elite music conservatory. Terence Fletcher (J.K. Simmons), an instructor known for his terrifying teaching methods, discovers Andrew and transfers the aspiring drummer into the top jazz ensemble, forever changing the young man's life. But Andrew's passion to achieve perfection quickly spirals into obsession, as his ruthless teacher pushes him to the brink of his ability and his sanity.

programme.title: Philomena
programme.desc: In 1952, Irish teenager Philomena (Judi Dench) became pregnant out of wedlock and was sent to a convent. When her baby, Anthony, was a toddler, the nuns took Philomena's child away from her and put him up for adoption in the United States. For the next 50 years, she searched tirelessly for her son. When former BBC correspondent Martin Sixsmith (Steve Coogan) learns of the story, he becomes her ally. They travel together to America to find Anthony and become unexpectedly close in the process.

programme.title: Indecent Proposal
programme.desc: David (Woody Harrelson) and Diana Murphy (Demi Moore) are a loving couple with a bright future. David is a talented architect; Diana is a top-notch real estate agent. But when the recession hits, their finances take a nosedive. In a last-ditch effort to save their dream home, they head to Las Vegas to win their mortgage money gambling. After they lose everything, a mysterious billionaire (Robert Redford) offers the solution to their money problems: $1 million -- if he can sleep with Diana.

programme.title: The Circus: Inside the Greatest Political Show on Earth
programme.desc: As President Biden travels to Brussels for an emergency NATO summit, "The Circus" examines Russia's threats of using nuclear weapons in its ongoing invasion of Ukraine and what the West is doing to prevent that catastrophic escalation.

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Col. Claus von Stauffenberg (Tom Cruise) serves Germany with loyalty and pride but fears that Hitler will destroy his country if allowed to run unchecked. With time running out for Germany and the rest of Europe, von Stauffenberg joins a group of like-minded, high-ranking men who want to overthrow the Nazi regime from within. With everything he holds dear in the balance, von Stauffenberg becomes the trigger man in a plot to assassinate the evil dictator.

programme.title: A Call to Spy
programme.desc: At the dawn of World War II, a desperate Winston Churchill orders his new spy agency to train women for covert operations. Together, these female agents help undermine the Nazi regime in France, leaving an unmistakable legacy in their wake.

programme.title: The Souvenir
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: All About Eve
programme.desc: Backstage story revolving around aspiring actress Eve Harrington. Tattered and forlorn, Eve shows up in the dressing room of Broadway mega-star Margo Channing, telling a melancholy life story to Margo and her friends. Margo takes Eve under her wing, and it appears that Eve is a conniver that uses Margo.

programme.title: On the Basis of Sex
programme.desc: Ruth Bader Ginsburg is a struggling attorney and new mother who faces adversity and numerous obstacles in her fight for equal rights. When Ruth takes on a groundbreaking tax case with her husband, attorney Martin Ginsburg, she knows it could change the direction of her career and the way the courts view gender discrimination.

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: After an awe-inspiring experience in outer space, an astronaut returns to Earth and starts to lose touch with reality in a world that now seems too small.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 young Donna, Tanya and Rosie graduate from Oxford University -- leaving Donna free to embark on a series of adventures throughout Europe. On her journeys, she makes the acquaintances of Harry, Bill and Sam -- the latter whom she falls in love with, but he's also the man who breaks her heart. In the present day, Donna's pregnant daughter, Sophie, dreams of renovating a taverna while reuniting with her mother's old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 young Donna, Tanya and Rosie graduate from Oxford University -- leaving Donna free to embark on a series of adventures throughout Europe. On her journeys, she makes the acquaintances of Harry, Bill and Sam -- the latter whom she falls in love with, but he's also the man who breaks her heart. In the present day, Donna's pregnant daughter, Sophie, dreams of renovating a taverna while reuniting with her mother's old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: After an awe-inspiring experience in outer space, an astronaut returns to Earth and starts to lose touch with reality in a world that now seems too small.

programme.title: The Song of Bernadette
programme.desc: Based on the popular novel by Franz Werfel, this drama focuses on Bernadette Soubirous (Jennifer Jones), a young French woman who experiences vivid visions of the Virgin Mary. While many dismiss her claims, certain people, including the priest Dominique Peyramale (Charles Bickford), slowly begin to believe her. Eventually, Bernadette is deemed a saint, and becomes a nun at a convent, where she must deal with jealousy from others who resent her revered status.

programme.title: The Seven Year Itch
programme.desc: In the midst of a summer heat wave, New Yorker Richard Sherman (Tom Ewell) ships his wife, Helen (Evelyn Keyes), and their son off to Maine for vacation. Left alone to work back in Manhattan, Richard encounters a gorgeous blonde model (Marilyn Monroe) who has moved into the apartment upstairs, and becomes immediately infatuated. While pondering infidelity, Richard dreams of his beautiful new neighbor -- but will his fantasies about her become a reality?

programme.title: Caprice
programme.desc: An industrial spy (Doris Day) for a cosmetics firm falls for another (Richard Harris) who may not be on her side.

programme.title: The Quiller Memorandum
programme.desc: After two British Secret Intelligence Service agents are murdered at the hands of a cryptic neo-Nazi group known as Phoenix, the suave agent Quiller (George Segal) is sent to Berlin to investigate. There, he begins an affair with Inge Lindt (Senta Berger), a beautiful young teacher. However, their lives are put in danger after Quiller is kidnapped and taken to Phoenix's headquarters, where he meets Oktober (Max von Sydow), the mysterious leader of the group.

programme.title: In Like Flint
programme.desc: Former Z.O.W.I.E. spy Derek Flint (James Coburn) is called back from retirement after his former spy chief, Lloyd C. Cramden (Lee J. Cobb), is framed for prurient behavior with a prostitute, and U.S. President Trent (Andrew Duggan) experiences an incident of "lost time." After Flint discovers irregularities on a recently launched space-station mission, he realizes that an international conspiracy is afoot. He travels the world and assumes myriad disguises to unravel the nefarious plot.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: New York Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) and his partner (Roy Scheider) chase a French heroin smuggler.

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Scott and Annie Russell couldn't be happier after buying their dream home from a mysterious and lonely widower named Charlie in Napa Valley, Calif. Their newfound paradise soon turns into a living nightmare when Charlie -- still strangely attached to the house -- begins to show up and interfere in their daily lives. When his erratic behavior turns to obsession, the young couple soon find themselves caught up in a violent confrontation that threatens to destroy everything they hold dear.

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: In deep space, the crew of the commercial starship Nostromo is awakened from their cryo-sleep capsules halfway through their journey home to investigate a distress call from an alien vessel. The terror begins when the crew encounters a nest of eggs inside the alien ship. An organism from inside an egg leaps out and attaches itself to one of the crew, causing him to fall into a coma.

actor.role: Warrant Officer Lt. Ellen L. Ripley

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: After floating in space for 57 years, Lt. Ripley's (Sigourney Weaver) shuttle is found by a deep space salvage team. Upon arriving at LV-426, the marines find only one survivor, a nine year old girl named Newt (Carrie Henn). But even these battle-hardened marines with all the latest weaponry are no match for the hundreds of aliens that have invaded the colony.

programme.title: Alien Resurrection
programme.desc: Two hundred years have passed since Ellen Ripley (Sigourney Weaver) died on Fiorina 161. Aboard the medical research vessel USM Auriga, a team of scientists clone Ripley from her extracted DNA and removes the alien Queen embryo which was growing inside her at the time of her death.

programme.title: Alien Resurrection
programme.desc: Two hundred years have passed since Ellen Ripley (Sigourney Weaver) died on Fiorina 161. Aboard the medical research vessel USM Auriga, a team of scientists clone Ripley from her extracted DNA and removes the alien Queen embryo which was growing inside her at the time of her death.

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Scott and Annie Russell couldn't be happier after buying their dream home from a mysterious and lonely widower named Charlie in Napa Valley, Calif. Their newfound paradise soon turns into a living nightmare when Charlie -- still strangely attached to the house -- begins to show up and interfere in their daily lives. When his erratic behavior turns to obsession, the young couple soon find themselves caught up in a violent confrontation that threatens to destroy everything they hold dear.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: Eyewitness
programme.desc: New York City custodian Daryll Deever (William Hurt) is a big fan of local news reporter Tony Sokolow (Sigourney Weaver), so he is intrigued when she shows up to cover a story at his workplace. There's been a murder in the office building, and Tony suspects that Daryll may have insight into the crime, a notion that he furthers to stay close to her. However, when those behind the killing begin to think that Daryll really knows something, they target both him and Tony to keep their secrets hidden.

programme.title: Diplomatic Courier
programme.desc: During the Cold War, diplomatic courier Mike Kells (Tyrone Power) must retrieve a dispatch containing top-secret intelligence. But when he arrives at the meeting point, a train station in Salzburg, his contact turns up dead, and the message is nowhere to be found. With no clear suspect in sight, Kells must sort through his uncertain relationships with two women (Patricia Neal, Hildegarde Neff), while sidestepping the pitfalls of subterfuge, sabotage and spies in his search for the documents.

programme.title: The Quiller Memorandum
programme.desc: After two British Secret Intelligence Service agents are murdered at the hands of a cryptic neo-Nazi group known as Phoenix, the suave agent Quiller (George Segal) is sent to Berlin to investigate. There, he begins an affair with Inge Lindt (Senta Berger), a beautiful young teacher. However, their lives are put in danger after Quiller is kidnapped and taken to Phoenix's headquarters, where he meets Oktober (Max von Sydow), the mysterious leader of the group.

programme.title: In Like Flint
programme.desc: Former Z.O.W.I.E. spy Derek Flint (James Coburn) is called back from retirement after his former spy chief, Lloyd C. Cramden (Lee J. Cobb), is framed for prurient behavior with a prostitute, and U.S. President Trent (Andrew Duggan) experiences an incident of "lost time." After Flint discovers irregularities on a recently launched space-station mission, he realizes that an international conspiracy is afoot. He travels the world and assumes myriad disguises to unravel the nefarious plot.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: New York Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) and his partner (Roy Scheider) chase a French heroin smuggler.

programme.title: Eyewitness
programme.desc: New York City custodian Daryll Deever (William Hurt) is a big fan of local news reporter Tony Sokolow (Sigourney Weaver), so he is intrigued when she shows up to cover a story at his workplace. There's been a murder in the office building, and Tony suspects that Daryll may have insight into the crime, a notion that he furthers to stay close to her. However, when those behind the killing begin to think that Daryll really knows something, they target both him and Tony to keep their secrets hidden.

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: In deep space, the crew of the commercial starship Nostromo is awakened from their cryo-sleep capsules halfway through their journey home to investigate a distress call from an alien vessel. The terror begins when the crew encounters a nest of eggs inside the alien ship. An organism from inside an egg leaps out and attaches itself to one of the crew, causing him to fall into a coma.

actor.role: Warrant Officer Lt. Ellen L. Ripley

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: After floating in space for 57 years, Lt. Ripley's (Sigourney Weaver) shuttle is found by a deep space salvage team. Upon arriving at LV-426, the marines find only one survivor, a nine year old girl named Newt (Carrie Henn). But even these battle-hardened marines with all the latest weaponry are no match for the hundreds of aliens that have invaded the colony.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York City policeman John McClane (Bruce Willis) is visiting his estranged wife (Bonnie Bedelia) and two daughters on Christmas Eve. He joins her at a holiday party in the headquarters of the Japanese-owned business she works for. But the festivities are interrupted by a group of terrorists who take over the exclusive high-rise, and everyone in it. Very soon McClane realizes that there's no one to save the hostages -- but him.

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: A year after his heroics in L.A, detective John McClane (Bruce Willis) is mixed up in another terrorist plot, this time at Washington Dulles International Airport, where he is waiting for his wife (Bonnie Bedelia). That same night, South American politico and drug profiteer Ramon Esperanza (Franco Nero) is arriving in U.S. custody. McClane takes action when a treasonous ex-colonel (William Sadler) seizes control of the airport, threatening to crash every inbound flight unless Esperanza is freed.

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Detective John McClane (Bruce Willis) is now divorced, alcoholic and jobless after getting fired for his reckless behavior and bad attitude. He is called back into action, however, when a cryptic terrorist (Jeremy Irons) takes New York City hostage in a lethal game of "Simon Says" and refuses to speak with anyone but McClane. Teaming up with a street-savvy electrician named Zeus Carver (Samuel L. Jackson), McClane dashes through the city, trying to stay one step ahead of a murderous plot.

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: Staff Sgt. William James (Jeremy Renner), Sgt. J.T. Sanborn (Anthony Mackie) and Specialist Owen Eldridge (Brian Geraghty) are members of a bomb-disposal unit in Baghdad. As their tour of duty enters its final weeks, the men face a set of increasingly hazardous situations, any of which could end their lives in an explosive instant.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: While visiting the Cherokee, Ian encounters a man from his past who dredges up painful memories of his time with the Mohawk; Jamie meets an Indian agent who challenges his convictions, causing him to reevaluate (New!).

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: Charismatic Southern politician Willie Stark's (Sean Penn) idealism and good intentions give way to corruption after he becomes governor of Louisiana. Unfortunately for Stark, his right-hand man (Jude Law) retains the same good moral fibre he had when the men both entered the political arena.

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: Plagued with worry and insomnia since saving New York from destruction, Tony Stark (Robert Downey Jr.), now, is more dependent on the suits that give him his Iron Man persona -- so much so that every aspect of his life is affected, including his relationship with Pepper (Gwyneth Paltrow). After a malevolent enemy known as the Mandarin (Ben Kingsley) reduces his personal world to rubble, Tony must rely solely on instinct and ingenuity to avenge his losses and protect the people he loves.

programme.title: Sicario: Day of the Soldado
programme.desc: FBI agent Matt Graver calls on mysterious operative Alejandro Gillick when Mexican drug cartels start to smuggle terrorists across the U.S. border. The war escalates even further when Alejandro kidnaps a top kingpin's daughter to deliberately increase the tensions. When the young girl is seen as collateral damage, the two men will determine her fate as they question everything that they are fighting for.

programme.title: 3 Days to Kill
programme.desc: Facing a terminal disease, spy Ethan Renner (Kevin Costner) has decided to give up his dangerous, high-stakes life in order to rebuild his relationship with his estranged wife and daughter (Hailee Steinfeld), whom he previously pushed away to keep them out of harm's way. However, in exchange for a potentially lifesaving drug, he must complete one final mission: apprehend one of the world's most ruthless terrorists while looking after his teenage offspring in her mother's absence.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: After the death of Richard the Lion-Hearted, a skilled archer named Robin Longstride (Russell Crowe) travels to Nottingham, where villagers suffer under a despotic sheriff and crippling taxation. He meets and falls in love with a spirited widow, Marion (Cate Blanchett), although she is skeptical of his motives. Hoping to win her heart and save the village, Robin gathers a band of warriors to fight corruption in Nottingham, little knowing they will soon be fighting to save England itself.

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: Staff Sgt. William James (Jeremy Renner), Sgt. J.T. Sanborn (Anthony Mackie) and Specialist Owen Eldridge (Brian Geraghty) are members of a bomb-disposal unit in Baghdad. As their tour of duty enters its final weeks, the men face a set of increasingly hazardous situations, any of which could end their lives in an explosive instant.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Irresponsible party girl Maggie (Cameron Diaz) is kicked out of her father's (Ken Howard) and stepmother's (Candice Azzara) home, where she lives for free, and is taken in by her hard-working sister, Philadelphia lawyer Rose (Toni Collette). After Maggie's disruptive ways ruin her sister's love life, Rose turns her out as well. But when their grandmother, who they never knew existed, comes into their lives, the sisters face some complicated truths about themselves and their family.

programme.title: Show Me the Father
programme.desc: Captivating stories interwoven with inspirational truths about the fatherhood of God.

programme.title: Two by Two: Overboard!
programme.desc: The exciting adventure of two best friends, Finny and Leah, as they try to escape a volcanic island and save the animals of the ark.

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: The Munros are a typically American dysfunctional family, complete with rebellious, uncommunicative offspring and baffled parents. Patriarch Bob (Robin Williams) would like to remedy the situation before his son and daughter instant-message their parents out of their lives. Bob rents a motor home to take the clan on vacation but soon finds that camping and togetherness can be hazardous to one's health.

programme.title: Hope Floats
programme.desc: Birdee Pruitt (Sandra Bullock) has been humiliated on live television by her best friend, Connie (Rosanna Arquette), who's been sleeping with Birdee's husband, Bill (Michael Paré). Birdee tries starting over with her daughter, Bernice (Mae Whitman), by returning to her small Texas hometown, but she's faced with petty old acquaintances who are thrilled to see Birdee unhappy -- except for her friend Justin (Harry Connick Jr.). As he helps Birdee get back on her feet, love begins to blossom.

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: Whenever Casey Newton (Britt Robertson) touches a lapel pin with the letter T on it, she finds herself transported to Tomorrowland, a city filled with huge robots and sleek buildings. The gifted young woman recruits the help of scientist Frank Walker (George Clooney), a previous visitor to Tomorrowland, who years ago made a startling discovery about the future. Together, the two adventurers travel to the metropolis to uncover its mysterious secrets.

programme.title: I Don't Know How She Does It
programme.desc: As an employee at a Boston-based financial firm, Kate Reddy (Sarah Jessica Parker) struggles daily to balance the demands of her high-powered career with the needs of her husband (Greg Kinnear) and children. When she gets an account that requires frequent trips to New York and her husband gets a new job, Kate finds herself spread even thinner. Complicating Kate's life even more is new business associate Jack Abelhammer (Pierce Brosnan), who throws temptation into the mix.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: While visiting the Cherokee, Ian encounters a man from his past who dredges up painful memories of his time with the Mohawk; Jamie meets an Indian agent who challenges his convictions, causing him to reevaluate (New!).

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Roy McCormick (Martin Lawrence) is a college basketball coach more famous for his temper than for his coaching ability. After one of his rages gets him banned from the sport, Roy takes a job coaching basketball at a middle school in an attempt to repair his reputation. Amazingly, what Roy began as a show of rehabilitation begins to genuinely change him, and he learns to care for his team. His relationship with local mom Jeanie (Wendy Raquel Robinson) is a good influence as well.

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: While conducting an autopsy on former NFL football player Mike Webster (David Morse), forensic pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu (Will Smith) discovers neurological deterioration that is similar to Alzheimer's disease. Omalu names the disorder chronic traumatic encephalopathy and publishes his findings in a medical journal. As other athletes face the same diagnosis, the crusading doctor embarks on a mission to raise public awareness about the dangers of football-related head trauma.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: While visiting the Cherokee, Ian encounters a man from his past who dredges up painful memories of his time with the Mohawk; Jamie meets an Indian agent who challenges his convictions, causing him to reevaluate (New!).

programme.title: Shining Vale
programme.desc: As Pat tries to get rid of Rosemary for good, she finds out that Terry has been keeping a horrifying secret from her; Gaynor learns a secret about Pat that will change how she views her mother forever (New!).

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: In 1931, the Bondurant brothers of Franklin County, Va., run a multipurpose backwoods establishment that hides their true business, bootlegging. Middle brother Forrest (Tom Hardy) is the brain of the operation; older Howard (Jason Clarke) is the brawn, and younger Jack (Shia LaBeouf), the lookout. Though the local police have taken bribes and left the brothers alone, a violent war erupts when a sadistic lawman (Guy Pearce) from Chicago arrives and tries to shut down the Bondurants operation.

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: When North Korean ruler Kim Jong-il (Trey Parker) orchestrates a global terrorist plot, it's up to the heavily armed marionettes of the highly specialized Team America unit to stop his dastardly scheme. The group, which includes the thespian-averse technology expert Chris (Matt Stone), not only has to face off against Jong-il, but they must also contend with F.A.G., the Film Actors Guild, a cadre of Hollywood liberals at odds with Team America's "policing the world" tactics.

actor.role: Gary Johnston/Joe/Kim Jong Il/Hans Blix/Carson/Matt Damon/Drunk in Bar/Tim Robbins/Sean Penn/Michael Moore/Helen Hunt/Susan Sarandon/Others

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: When their ship crashes on an unexplored planet, the survivors of the crash soon discover that this planet that is normally always day is going to soon be in a state of eclipse that will bring out deadly nocturnal creatures. Will a prison convict (Vin Diesel) being transported on the ship end up being the one man who can lead the survivors off the planet?

programme.title: Power Book IV: Force
programme.desc: Tommy and his crew can barely keep up with the demand and they need more help to increase their supply; More shocking details about Tommy's family surface, and he realizes the news could potentially affect his business.

programme.title: Shining Vale
programme.desc: As Pat tries to get rid of Rosemary for good, she finds out that Terry has been keeping a horrifying secret from her; Gaynor learns a secret about Pat that will change how she views her mother forever (New!).

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: While conducting an autopsy on former NFL football player Mike Webster (David Morse), forensic pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu (Will Smith) discovers neurological deterioration that is similar to Alzheimer's disease. Omalu names the disorder chronic traumatic encephalopathy and publishes his findings in a medical journal. As other athletes face the same diagnosis, the crusading doctor embarks on a mission to raise public awareness about the dangers of football-related head trauma.

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: Mike (Chris Farley), a slovenly gym teacher, has a terrible habit of showing up at the wrong time and embarrassing his brother, Al (Tim Matheson), who happens to be running for governor. Hoping to save his campaign, Al assigns his aide, Steve (David Spade), to take Mike to a remote cabin and hide out there for the remainder of the campaign. In the woods, the two men discover dangers that make them long for the sleazy political operatives back in the big city.

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: When North Korean ruler Kim Jong-il (Trey Parker) orchestrates a global terrorist plot, it's up to the heavily armed marionettes of the highly specialized Team America unit to stop his dastardly scheme. The group, which includes the thespian-averse technology expert Chris (Matt Stone), not only has to face off against Jong-il, but they must also contend with F.A.G., the Film Actors Guild, a cadre of Hollywood liberals at odds with Team America's "policing the world" tactics.

programme.title: Shining Vale
programme.desc: As Pat tries to get rid of Rosemary for good, she finds out that Terry has been keeping a horrifying secret from her; Gaynor learns a secret about Pat that will change how she views her mother forever (New!).

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: In 1931, the Bondurant brothers of Franklin County, Va., run a multipurpose backwoods establishment that hides their true business, bootlegging. Middle brother Forrest (Tom Hardy) is the brain of the operation; older Howard (Jason Clarke) is the brawn, and younger Jack (Shia LaBeouf), the lookout.
